description.text:
At 3rd level, an urban hunter and her animal companion take no penalties when dealing nonlethal damage with weapons or natural attacks. At 6th level and every 3 levels thereafter, the urban hunter selects a bonus feat from the following list to be gained by both the hunter and her animal companion:
Improved Bull Rush, Improved Dirty Trick, Improved Disarm, Improved Grapple, and Improved Trip.
At 12th level, the hunter can also select from the following feats:
Combat Patrol, Combat Reflexes, Disarming Strike, Greater Bull Rush, Greater Dirty Trick, Greater Disarm, Greater Grapple, Greater Trip, and Lunge.
Neither the hunter nor her animal companion needs to meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
